Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to suspending certain payments for ninety days in response to the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
Summary: Suspends all student loan, mortgage, auto loan, credit card, and utility payments for ninety days in response to the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
ActClause: AN ACT to suspend certain payments for ninety days in response to the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
